import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Welcome = () => { const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentTime(new Date()); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); // Helper function for slide background styles const slideBgStyle = (imageUrl) => ({ height: '400px', // set height as needed backgroundImage: `url(${imageUrl})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', }); return (
{/* Header with Logo, Navigation, and Login/Register at Top Right */}

{/* Row for Logo, Title, Navigation, and Buttons */}
{/* Logo */}
{/* Title and Subtitle */}

{/* Navigation Links */}

{/* Main Banner with Carousel and Clock */}

Welcome to LUCT Reporting System

Empowering Education with Real-Time Insights

Current Time: {currentTime.toLocaleTimeString('en-ZA', { timeZone: 'Africa/Johannesburg' })}

{/* Optional overlay content */} {/*

Join Our Team

Contribute to innovative teaching at LUCT.

); }; export default Welcome;
